00030 class WebStorage {
00031     public:

00048             private:

00055         class Origin {
00056             public:
00058                 COS_LOCAL Origin(const gaia::base::String& origin, int64_t quota,
00059                         int64_t usage);

00067                 COS_LOCAL explicit Origin(const gaia::base::String& origin);

00093     public:
00094         // Message ids
00095         static const int32_t UPDATE = 0;
00096         static const int32_t SET_QUOTA_ORIGIN = 1;
00097         static const int32_t DELETE_ORIGIN = 2;
00098         static const int32_t DELETE_ALL = 3;
00099         static const int32_t GET_ORIGINS = 4;
00100         static const int32_t GET_USAGE_ORIGIN = 5;
00101         static const int32_t GET_QUOTA_ORIGIN = 6;
00102 
00103         // Message ids on the UI thread
00104         static const int32_t RETURN_ORIGINS = 0;
00105         static const int32_t RETURN_USAGE_ORIGIN = 1;
00106         static const int32_t RETURN_QUOTA_ORIGIN = 2;
00107 
00108     public:
00109         /*
00110          * When calling getOrigins(), getUsageForOrigin() and getQuotaForOrigin(),
00111          * we need to get the values from webcore, but we cannot block while doing so
00112          * as we used to do, as this could result in a full deadlock (other webcore
00113          * messages received while we are still blocked here, see http://b/2127737).
00114          *
00115          * We have to do everything asynchronously, by providing a callback function.
00116          * We post a message on the webcore thread (mHandler) that will get the result
00117          * from webcore, and we post it back on the UI thread (using mUIHandler).
00118          * We can then use the callback function to return the value.
00119          */
00120 
00124         void deleteAllData();
00125 
00129         void deleteOrigin(const gaia::base::String& origin);
00130 
00135         static WebStorage* getInstance();
00136 
00141         void getOrigins(const ValueCallback<OriginMap>& callback);
00142 
00146         void getQuotaForOrigin(const gaia::base::String origin,
00147                 ValueCallback<int64_t>* callback);
00148 
00152         void getUsageForOrigin(const gaia::base::String& origin,
00153                 ValueCallback<int64_t>* callback);
00154 
00158         void setQuotaForOrigin(const gaia::base::String& origin, int64_t quota);
00159 
00160     private:
00161         WebStorage() {
00162         }
00163 
00164     private:
00165         static WebkitProxy* mspcInnerWebStorage;
00166         static WebStorage* mspcSdkWebStorage;
00167 };
